name: National Honor Society for Dance Arts
description: The National Honor Society for Dance Artsâ„¢ (NHSDA) is a program of the National Dance Education Organization created to recognize outstanding artistic merit leadership and academic achievement in students studying dance in public and private schools in K-12 education dance studios cultural/community centers performing arts organizations and post-secondary education. We will offer the Secondary Program for grades 9-12.

announcements.title: Meetings
announcements.description: Club meetings take place Wednesday after school at Dance Studio.
